job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.

primary: Strong oral and written communication skills
all: Strong oral and written communication skills

jd: From: sarfaraz, convextech Inc sarfaraz@convextech.com Reply to: sarfaraz@convextech.com HiHope you are doing good.!!Please let me know if you are interested in the position below Title: Java Principal EngineerLocation : Hagerstown, MD hybrid , MUST - be local to hagerstownDuration : 6 months contract to hire - perm salary conversion will be around 140 - 150kVisa : No H1b/CPT Job Description MUST - be local to hagerstown, MD 21742 (hybrid, 3x onsite/2x remote) or willing to relocate before the first dayQualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.5+ years of experience in a senior software engineering role.Proficiency in Java programming language. - I need versions 17 and 21!!!Proficiency in Spring Boot or Quarkus web frameworks.Knowledge of Contexts and Dependency Injection (CDI) in Java.Experience with one or more major cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, Vercel).Experience with SQL (e.g., Azure SQL Server) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).Experience with CI/CD tools and test automation.Experience with DevOps tools and principles.Experience with Agile development methodology and tools (e.g., Jira).Preferred Skills:Experience with C#, Python, JavaScript, Go, or similar programming languages.Experience with web-based applications to store and access complex “big” data.Experience with Azure Data Explorer or Log Analytics and the Kusto Query Language.Understanding of common IoT architectures and tools.Understanding of microservice architecture and scalability.Experience with system design considering cybersecurity and SecOps principles.Strong oral and written communication skills.Experience with automotive or heavy-duty construction/industrial equipment.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Experience with MQTT and other IoT messaging systems.Ability to thrive in a startup-like culture, excel in ambiguous situations, and embrace technical challenges.Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Day to Day:Design, implement, and test cloud-based applications to enable enhanced levels of machine connectivity and control.Play a pivotal role in developing and maintaining applications that manage data consumption and egress within our cloud infrastructure.Evaluate new Internet of Things (IoT) products and practices, and identify software system designs and solutions.Plan, develop, and implement improvements and changes to existing architecture and applications.Coordinate system development and execution in a team environment.Provide direction and technical counsel to lower-level developers and software engineers.Research, study, and propose the use of new software/technologies to be used in the development of new and improved products and features.Prepare technical solution design proposals and presentations.
